title: Testing Tesla’s Autopilot recall, I don’t feel much safer — and neither should you
description: On the streets of San Francisco, Tesla’s updated driver-assistance software still took the wheel in places it wasn’t designed to handle, including blowing through stop signs.

title: Your Gen Z New Year’s Eve party may have been planned on Partiful
description: Millions of mostly under-30s are turning to the text-based party-planning platform, the company said, after shunning Facebook and email-based event organizers.
